head.title: COVID-19 2020 - Edinburgh Community Schools

div.h1:
Edinburgh Community School Corporation
Empowering And Encouraging All Students Through Education.

nav.div: Edinburgh Community Schools » News » What's New » COVID-19 2020

span.style: font-size: 34.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 400; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(52, 80, 144);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: There are many questions surrounding the COVID-19 virus and its impact on our students, buildings, and our community. Please know that our corporation is monitoring the situation to determine what is in the best interest for our students and community.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: At this time ECSC will be closing schools from March 23rd to April 6th. ECSC will use DOE waiver days from March 23rd to March 27th, at which time teachers will be participating in professional development activities. We will conduct e-Learning Days from Monday, March 30th to Friday April 3rd.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: Students in 2nd grade through 12th grade that need their device to complete e-learning can pick up their laptop at the front entry of their school from March 23rd to March 27th from 10:00am to 3:00pm by appointment. Kindergarten and 1st grade students will have packets to pick up March 25th during that time as well. To schedule a pickup, complete the

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: or on our Facebook page. If you are unable to register online please call to schedule a pick up at 812-526-2681.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: At this time classes are scheduled to resume on April 6th. However, that may change based on the guidance we receive from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC) and the county and state health departments, the Department of Education, and the Governor. We will provide updates to our staff and families via email / social media.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: All extra- and co-curricular activities, which include all athletic activities will be cancelled through April 6th and all field trips will be cancelled through April.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: For e-Learning support please contact your child's teacher via email or the teacher’s other prefered method. For technology support please contact Bob Straugh at 812-526-2681 or

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: We will continue to share information and update communications regularly. With your help we will do what’s best for all Edinburgh Community School’s students and staff.

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

p.span: On behalf of the Edinburgh Community schools’ Board of Trustees and our administrative staff, thank you for your understanding

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

font-size: 11.5pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(85, 85, 85);

div.p: Edinburgh Schools does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district’s activities and programs. Edinburgh Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
